story.title: Test 1
story.author: A. Storyteller
story.description: This is a fascinating little tale about someone who goes above and beyond the norm.  In fact, you will start to doubt whether this story is true.

scenes.teaser: A man walks into a bar...
scenes.heading: This is funny.
scenes.prose: A man walks into a bar and says, "Ouch"

scenes.heading: You Win!
scenes.prose: Since you have such a good sense of humor, you are a winner in my book.

scenes.heading: You die.
scenes.prose: Since you are unable to laugh, you die of a heart attack.  Too bad.
